item.title: biology/bedops: 2.4.40
item.description: BEDOPS is an open-source command-line toolkit that performs highly efficient and scalable Boolean and other set operations, statistical calculations, archiving, conversion and other management of genomic data of arbitrary scale.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: math/rstudio: 1.3.1093
item.description: RStudio is an integrated development environment (IDE) for R. It includes a console, syntax-highlighting editor that supports direct code execution, as well as tools for plotting, history, debugging and workspace management.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: devel/nvhpc: 21.5
item.description: NVIDIA HPC Software Development Kit (SDK) including C, C++, and Fortran compilers.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: math/py-triton: 1.0.0_py39
item.description: Triton is a language and compiler for writing highly efficient custom Deep-Learning primitives.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: math/py-pytorch: 1.6.0_py36
item.description: PyTorch is a deep learning framework that puts Python first.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: devel/py-pandas: 1.3.1_py39
item.description: pandas is an open source, BSD-licensed library providing high-performance, easy-to-use data structures and data analysis tools for the Python programming language.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: devel/py-h5py: 3.1.0_py36
item.description: The h5py package is a Pythonic interface to the HDF5 binary data format.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: devel/hdf5: 1.12.0
item.description: HDF5 is a data model, library, and file format for storing and managing data. It supports an unlimited variety of datatypes, and is designed for flexible and efficient I/O and for high volume and complex data.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: physics/py-namaster: 1.2.1_py36
item.description: NaMaster is a C library, Python module and standalone program to compute full-sky angular cross-power spectra of masked fields with arbitrary spin and an arbitrary number of known contaminants using a pseudo-Cl (aka MASTER) approach.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: physics/cfitsio: 4.0.0
item.description: FITSIO is a library of C and Fortran subroutines for reading and writing data files in FITS (Flexible Image Transport System) data format.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: chemistry/orca: 5.0.0
item.description: ORCA is a flexible, efficient and easy-to-use general purpose tool for quantum chemistry.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: system/git-annex: 8.20210622
item.description: git-annex allows managing files with git, without checking the file contents into git.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: devel/py-pycuda: 2021.1_py36
item.description: PyCUDA lets you access Nvidiaâ€˜s CUDA parallel computation API from Python.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: viz/veusz: 3.3.1
item.description: Veusz is a scientific plotting and graphing program with a graphical user interface, designed to produce publication-ready 2D and 3D plots.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: devel/cuda: 11.3.1
item.description: CUDA is a parallel computing platform and application programming interface (API) model created by Nvidia. It allows software developers and software engineers to use a CUDA-enabled graphics processing unit (GPU) for general purpose processing.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: system/py-pyopengl: 3.1.5_py39
item.description: Standard OpenGL bindings for Python.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: math/py-scipy: 1.6.3_py39
item.description: The SciPy library provides many user-friendly and efficient numerical routines such as routines for numerical integration and optimization.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: math/py-psbody-mesh: 0.4_py39
item.description: The MPI-IS Mesh Processing Library contains core functions for manipulating meshes and visualizing them.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: math/py-cupy: 7.8.0_py36
item.description: CuPy is an implementation of NumPy-compatible multi-dimensional array on CUDA.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: devel/nagfor: npl6a70na
item.description: The NAG Fortran Compiler is a full standard implementation of the ISO Fortran 95 language with the addition of all of Fortran 2003, most of Fortran 2008 and OpenMP 3.0 and 3.1.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: math/nagnl: nll6i272nl
item.description: NAG library of numerical algorithms.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: math/nagdc: dcl6i34ngl
item.description: (Adjoint) Algorithmic Differentiation software tool for computing sensitivities of C++ codes.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: devel/cmake: 3.20.3
item.description: CMake is an extensible, open-source system that manages the build process in an operating system and in a compiler-independent manner.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: devel/java: 11.0.11
item.description: Java is a general-purpose computer programming language that is concurrent, class-based, object-oriented,[14] and specifically designed to have as few implementation dependencies as possible.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: biology/sra-tools: 2.11.0
item.description: The SRA Toolkit and SDK from NCBI is a collection of tools and libraries for using data in the INSDC Sequence Read Archives.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: system/slurm-drmaa: 1.1.2
item.description: DRMAA for Slurm Workload Manager (Slurm) is an implementation of Open Grid Forum Distributed Resource Management Application API (DRMAA) version 1 for submission and control of jobs to Slurm.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: devel/opencv: 4.5.2
item.description: OpenCV (Open Source Computer Vision Library) is an open source computer vision and machine learning software library.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: viz/py-matplotlib: 3.4.2_py39
item.description: Matplotlib is a Python 2D plotting library which produces publication quality figures in a variety of hardcopy formats and interactive environments across platforms.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: devel/boost: 1.76.0
item.description: Boost is a set of libraries for the C++ programming language that provide support for tasks and structures such as linear algebra, pseudorandom number generation, multithreading, image processing, regular expressions, and unit testing.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: biology/py-pybedtools: 0.8.2_py36
item.description: Pybedtools wraps and extends BEDTools and offers feature-level manipulations from within Python.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: math/py-numpy: 1.20.3_py39
item.description: NumPy is the fundamental package for scientific computing with Python.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: system/osu-micro-benchmarks: 5.7
item.description: The OSU MicroBenchmarks carry out a variety of message passing performance tests using MPI.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: devel/nccl: 2.8.4
item.description: NCCL (pronounced Nickel) is a stand-alone library of standard collective communication routines, such as all-gather, reduce, broadcast, etc., that have been optimized to achieve high bandwidth over PCIe.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: devel/ucx: 1.10.0
item.description: UCX is a communication library implementing high-performance messaging for MPI/PGAS frameworks.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: devel/bazelisk: 1.8.0
item.description: Bazelisk is a wrapper for Bazel written in Go.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: devel/hpcx/2.7.0.luadevel/hpcx/2.8.0.luadevel/hpcx: 2.8.1
item.description: Mellanox HPC-X toolkit is a comprehensive software package that includes MPI and SHMEM/PGAS communications libraries.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: math/py-pytorch: 1.8.1_py39
item.description: PyTorch is a deep learning framework that puts Python first.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: biology/py-mapdamage: 2.2.1_py36
item.description: mapDamage2 is a computational framework which tracks and quantifies DNA damage patterns among ancient DNA sequencing reads generated by Next-Generation Sequencing platforms.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: devel/openmpi: 4.1.0
item.description: The Open MPI Project is an open source Message Passing Interface implementation that is developed and maintained by a consortium of academic, research, and industry partners.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: system/poppler: 0.47.0
item.description: Poppler is a PDF rendering library.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)
